Start: ^Your shift at the tavern is almost finished, the only people left are Ivor and Jenny.
^They are chatting and flirting as always.
^But at some point, while you're washing the dishes, you notice that they are starting to argue.
^Jenny rushes out of the tavern. Ivor is fuming, as he gets up, he smashes the chair on the ground, then follows Jenny outside.
1_A: ^A few days have passed and you never saw Jenny after that time.
^The siuation is strange, maybe Ivor did something, this must be investigated.
^He looks like he hasn't slept in ages and he also seems pissed.
^You pour the usual liquor Ivor drinks into a glass, put some ice, then serve it to him.

s: ^Heard you and Jenny are having some problems...

c-0: ^You "I've heard you and Jenny are having some problems, is everything ok?
c-1: ^You "Is Jenny ok? She hasn't come in a while...

2_A: ^Ivor lowers his voice as he speaks the last words, something is wrong, "I think"? what does he mean?

c-0: ^Ivor "Did I say that? I didn't mean it.
c-1: ^You "Oh that's good to hear, I was really worried, she didn't seem fine the other day.

2_B: ^Ivor "We're fine, and it's none of your business anyway.
^Ivor is visibly upset, why is he so defensive?

c-0: ^You "Sorry man, I'm just trying to help here.
c-1: ^You "Sorry, I'm just worried about her, she didn't seem fine the other day.

3_A: ^Ivor "We had a small fight, everything is fine now...
^It seems like he's a bit more calm now.

s: ^It's weird that she hasn't come here

c-0: ^You "I'm just asking because it's weird that she hasn't been here in a while... maybe you know why.
c-1: ^You "Oh that's great! I thought you killed her ahahah...
c-2: ^You "That tone is not convincing at all you know...

3_B: ^He looks furious, like the other day with Jenny...
^All of a sudden you feel a void in your stomach.

s: ^The situation doesn't look good for you

c-0: ^You "Jeez man, chill down, you're overreacting, I'm just concerned about Jenny.
^Ivor "Are you deaf or something? I just told you we're fine... she's fine...
^He doens't look angry anymore, more... sad
c-1: ^You "Look, the thing is, you two argued, she left, you followed her, then she disappeared, it doesn't look good for you.

4_A: ^Ivor sips the last liquor left in the glass, it's difficult to understand his emotions...

s: ^You don't know what happened to Jenny?

c-0: ^You "So you know nothing about what happened to her after that night?
^Ivor "Can you stop harrasing me with questions?
c-1: ^You "Do you want another drink? it's on the house.
^You pour the liquor again, untill the glass is filled, no ice this time

Bad: ^Ivor is still upset, he probably won't tell you anything today.
^He takes some coins from his pocket, leaves them on the counter.
^Then he gets up and goes away, without saying a word.
^You got nothing from this conversation, you feel down...
Good: ^Ivor "I really don't know what happened to her you know...
^He seems like he's about to cry
^Ivor "We got into that fight... stupid fight
^Ivor "Then she left... I tried to chase her, I was upset, but I wanted to say sorry...
^Ivor "When I went out she was already gone... and I haven't heard from her since...
^He starts to cry, his eyes are full with pain
^Ivor "I can't think that she just left, something must've happened...
^Ivor continues to cry over his glass, sips some liquor...

c-0: ^You "I know I'm just a barista, but I will discover what happened to her and you'll get her back... I promise
^Ivor "Thanks man... I'll tell you if I know something
^Ivor gets up and leaves the tavern, you know he was sincere.
c-1: ^You "She probably just left you and doesn't want to see you again, I know you treated her wrong...
^Ivor gets up and leaves, slamming the door after him.
